description:
Noriko and Kazumi head home for some R&R, but quickly discover how much has changed before realizing that time may be against them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please! Save Some Time for Love
S`il vous plaît, laissez un peu de temps à l`amour
ขอร้องละ! ขอเวลาให้ความรักหน่อย
お願い!! 愛に時間を!
